headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KHODARA, JACQUES ELIE

snippet: KHODARA--Jacques Elie. Jacques Elie Khodara died peacefully at home on January 26. He is survived by his loving wife Mara, daughter Tatiana, sons Daniel, Jean-Philippe, Jean-Jerome, and Gregory, and grandchildren Nelson, Eleonore, Lea, Jeremy, and Noemie. Jacques had a widespread career in international real estate. His energy and love of life will be missed by his family and friends all over the world. Jacques' funeral service will be 11:15am, Thursday, January 28th at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
